home.title-p1: The city is in a state of shock over the fate of two hometown heroes: Eagles starting quarterback Archie Hughes, and his even more famous wife, Grammy-winning singer Francine Hughes.
home.title-p2: Even before the case hits the courtroom, itâ€™s the hottest ticket in town.
home.title-p3: For the defense: Cooper Lamb, private investigator to the stars.
home.quote1: James Patterson writes his thrillers as if he were building roller coasters.

contact.address-desc: Building B, Unesco street, Sukhbaatar district, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia

biography.quote: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un will visit Russia this month to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin. The leaders of the two countries will discuss the supply of weapons from North Korea to Russia in connection with the Russia-Ukraine war.
